name: Space Ambulance
description:
The galaxy is threatened by a strange disease. Your mission is to go to the Galactic Hospital with 3 different species to create a vaccine to save everyone !

You will also need to rescue people as you go and be careful about your fuel or you won't be able to finish your quest.

Made by:

- Henri Roumegoux / henri.roumegoux@epitech.eu

- Jean Lam / jean.lam@epitech.eu
